titles.title: Congratulating the Montana Future Farmers of America on the occasion of its 75th Anniversary and celebrating the achievements of Montana FFA members.
Congratulating the Montana Future Farmers of America on the occasion of its 75th Anniversary and celebrating the achievements of Montana FFA members.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Congratulates the Montana Future Farmers of America (FFA) on its 75th anniversary.
Celebrates the Montana FFA members' achievements in agriculture and agribusiness at the local, State, and Federal levels.
